00180 inline uint16

00185 
00186 inline uint32 
00187 MapGenerator::getMapID(uint32 i) 
00188 {
00189    if (i<nbrMaps)
00190       return (mapIDs[i]);
00191    else
00192       return (MAX_UINT32);
00193 };
